name: Five Nights at the Scrapyard
description:
Welcome to Jeremy's ScrapYard, a place where you drop off your old metal and sell it to make money.

But you are not here for this

You are here for a night duty

Monitor cameras

Recharge the power

And don't let burglars in

At least that's what YOU think

Credit: All sounds were taken from, FNaf 1, 2, 3, and TJoC

Artwork is made by Me

I do not own the sound effects, they go to their rightful owners.

IMPORTANT: Click the green flag 2 times to make sure no bugs will be found

If will be found, then restart the game.

There will be a second part for the game, and bug fixes

ENJOY THE GAME!
